“Collection Overview,” James K. Polk Papers, 1827-1849, New York Public Library Archives

footnotes.text:
1Abraham Lincoln, Thomas J. Turner, John Wentworth, John A. McClernand, and Robert
                  Smith signed their own names and wrote their places of residence.  This is from a
                  volume of autographs fromJames K. Polkand members of his administration, 1848-49.“Collection Overview,” James K. Polk Papers, 1827-1849, New York Public Library Archives
                     & Manuscripts, New York, New York,http://archives.nypl.org/mss/17764#descriptive_identity.
